      public void setSize(int size)

    • runTest

      public void runTest(CollectionTest.CollectionType type, CollectionTest.TestType test, int iterations)
      runTest method: Has a loop for iterations. Depending on the type and test, the correct method is called to carry out the relevant test
      Specified by:
      runTest in interface CollectionTest
      Parameters:
      type - this is the collection type(array list, linked list or hashmap)
      test - this is the test type (add, search or index)
      iterations - this is the number of times the tests are iterated through

    • index

      public void index(List<Person> list)
      index method: index method for both array and linked lists. divides collection size by 2 to get index roughly half way through. loops through list and gets the index.
      Parameters:
      list - this is the list where it can be an array or a linked list

    • indexHashMap

      public void indexHashMap(HashMap<Integer,Person> map)
      indexHashMap method: index method for hashmaps only. Creates ID variable which is collectionsize/2 to be halfway. Loops through hashmap using "entrySet". Gets the key at each entry and compares to the keyset array at ID (halfway). Gets the value
      Parameters:
      map - this is the map

    • search

      public void search(List<Person> list)
      search method: search method for both array and linked lists. uses personSearched string to find the person at roughly halfway through. loops through list. compares the name of personsearched to name in the list.
      Parameters:
      list - this is the list where it can be an array or a linked list

    • searchHashMap

      public void searchHashMap(HashMap<Integer,Person> map)
      searchHashMap method: search method for hash maps. creates ID variable as collectionSize/2 to be roughly halfway. looks for that key in the map. gets the person.
      Parameters:
      map - this is the hash map
